Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Good day! Thanks for reaching out to the Salesforce Helpdesk Team.
I have taken ownership of this case and will be working proactively to provide you with a solution at the earliest.
Feel free to reach out to us if you have any further queries.
Regards, {!Case.OwnerFullName} Salesforce Helpdesk
